data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Souto, Paula Malaquias, Da-Silva, Elidiomar Ribeiro, Nessimian, Jorge Luiz, Gonçalves, Inês Corrêa (2016): Two new species of Ulmeritoides Traver (Ephemeroptera: Leptophlebiidae) from Southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4078 (1): 127-136, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4078.1.11
